Desc.entry: Provides social, religious, charitable and educational activities. Part of the worldwide Ahmadiyya movement aiming for world peace, brotherhood and non-violence. Events include Eid Milan Party, Eid Meeting, Ramadhan (Iftar parties), Ramadhan (prayer meetings), Religious Founder Day events and an annual conference etc. Organises a charity walk to raise funds to support local and national charities.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Friday (prayer meetings), monthly (other meetings), weekly & monthly (ladies meetings)
